divs: Sighting Detailsi was outside looking at the stars and constellations because thats what i do when i go outside (have a 4 inch telescope). i was looking almost straight (summer triangle) up when i saw the object pass into my field of view. i followed it for 5 to 8 seconds before i lost it to the darkness.
Summary: triangular dark surface no lights almost shadowlike
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Hammond
There were no other sightings in Hammond on or around October 25th 2012
